trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around June 11th 2013
divs: sighting detailsthis morning at 7:23 am i seen a silver\gray object (cigar shape) traveling along, it stopped in mid air paused for about 5 secs and dropped straight down slowly into a cloud and stayed there, i never seen it after it went into the small cloud. it had no wings, i watched it for about 30 secs. either sun glint or a light brightened up on it as it stopped and went straight downward. i was on new tullahoma hwy heading into tullahoma from the hwy the object would have been on the left over by the rose hill memorial gardens (cemetery) approx: 45 degree angle in the sky above horizon
Summary: Tullahoma TN - Silver Cigar Shaped Object No Wings Traveling Along, Stopped and Went Straight Down
